author: Andrew Ang J:
casename: Fornet Enterprise Co Ltd v Howell Universal Pte Ltd and Others
counsel: Lim Tong Chuan and Awyong Leong Hwee (Loo and Partners) for the plaintiff; Lim Chong Boon (PKWA Law Practice LLC) for the first to third defendants
tags-parsed: Contract/Breach/Whether defendants breaching alleged agreement by failing to exercise due care and diligence, acting contrary to plaintiff's interests and failing to remit certain monies to plaintiff

Contract/Contractual terms/Plaintiff claiming agreement with defendants constituted partly orally, partly in writing and partly based upon course of past dealings between parties/Whether relationship between plaintiff and defendants under alleged agreement one of mercantile agency or partnership or joint venture
Contract/Parties/Plaintiff suing defendants for breach of alleged agreement/Whether defendants parties to alleged agreement
Tort/Conspiracy/Whether defendants involved in conspiracy to injure plaintiff and conspiracy by unlawful means
Tort/Conversion/Whether defendants liable in conversion for failing to remit to plaintiff proceeds of sale collected
